GOComponent - Class in com.android.slackandhay.gameobject.component
Components are what makes gameObjects functional: as the constituting parts of their parent object, they can add properties, behavior or certain services to it.

GOComponentAI - Class in com.android.slackandhay.gameobject.component
this class represents the AI component used in the game, it is inherited inside the presets for real functionality.

GOComponentControl - Class in com.android.slackandhay.gameobject.component
this class represents how game objects are controlled, meaning right now that they be controlled via an AI or the hardware controls (like the touch screen) The ComponentAI and the ComponentInput inherit this class

GOComponentDefense - Class in com.android.slackandhay.gameobject.component
A component of this type handles damage that is dealt by other gameObjects, which means it literally decided what to do with it.

GOComponentMovement - Class in com.android.slackandhay.gameobject.component
A component of this type implements movement on a macro level, that is, it can be given a target point in world coordinates and it will do its best (which can amount to as little or as much as the implementation cares) to get there.
